name: Tashfeen Riaz
title: Web Designer & Developer
bio: I'm Tashfeen Riaz, a passionate web designer and developer based in Gilgit, Pakistan. I design and build clean, modern, and responsive web experiences that balance creativity with functionality. Every project I work on is an opportunity to turn ideas into intuitive interfaces, seamless interactions, and meaningful digital journeys. From concept to code, I focus on clarity, precision, and attention to detail â€” creating work that is not only visually engaging but also effective and user-friendly.
